properties.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 18 at 6:14AM AKST until February 18 at 6:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks, AK
properties.description:
* WHAT...Heavy snow and blowing snow occurring. Plan on
difficult travel conditions. Additional snow accumulations of
up to two inches, with localized amounts up to 5 inches, are
expected.

* WHERE...Lower Yukon Valley.

* WHEN...Until 6 PM today.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds gusting as high as 40 mph will
cause areas of blowing and drifting snow.
properties.instruction:
A Winter Storm Warning for snow and blowing snow means severe
winter weather conditions are occurring. This will make travel
very difficult or impossible.

NWSheadline: WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM AKST THIS EVENING... ...WINTER STORM WARNING HAS EXPIRED
